Explanation:
The paragraph discusses the energy loss in photovoltaic devices and attributes it to the difference in LUMO (Lowe Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) levels between two specific materials, PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM. Therefore, the valid entities are the energy loss and the LUMO levels of the mentioned materials.
